subject: Dear Sir/Ma
body:
Dear Sir/Ma
Greetings to you and your Family.
Please forgive me for approaching you through this media.
    I’m Miss Kate Robert &  17 Yrs Old (Student) I lost my Dad two yrs
ago and I'm the only Child (Daughter).
My Uncle took over my Dad properties. My Dad lawyer inform privately
that My Dad has a Fund in a Security Firm and the best way to get it
is to seek foreign partner  and he or she will be use as my Late
Father’s partner.
The amount available for the investment is over Twenty Eight Million
United States Dollars.($28.000.000.00) and
 I seek for  your swift
response and direct you to my Late Father Lawyer.
    Name.
    Address.
    Occupation.
    Tel/Fax.
    Age.
 
Copy your ID.
    passport
.
    Warmest Regards,
    Ms.Kate Robert

subject: Re: Dear Sir/Ma
body:
Hello Robert,

I'm sorry to hear about your loss. It must be a challenging time for you. I appreciate your trust in reaching out to me regarding this matter.

It's quite interesting that your father had such a substantial fund in a security firm. Could you tell me more about it? What kind of investment was he involved in?

Also, could you provide more details about the process of transferring these funds? How does having a foreign partner help in this situation?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Erin
